nodes.text: You thought you could hide from the truth? You thought you could deny reality?
transitions: Who are you? What are you saying?

nodes.text: Oh don't be stupid. I AM YOU. I AM HORROR. I AM THE MONSTER. I KILLED EVERYONE.
transitions: Don't be stupid. That red shirted guy with the mustache killed everyone

nodes.text: HAH You're blind. You sick bastard, imagining all of this in your head. Trying to escape. HAH HAH HAH
transitions: What? I didn't kill everyone... I ... I found that knife! In that briefcase! And the cop! And the... And the...

nodes.text: Just stop it. You killed everyone and now you're in your fantasy world of denial. Accept it, Thomas.
